evidence.text: Person A: I am Galinda Upland. Of the Upper Uplands?

Person A: Madame Morrible?!
Person A: But you can of course come visit me whenever you want!

Person B: I do not teach my seminar every semester. Of course, if someone very special were to come along---
Person A: Well, naturally! Which is why I wanted to talk to you...

Person A: Magic is merely the mind's attempt to wrap itself around the impossible. Yes: I did that... ...to prepare you to expect th e unexpected here at Shiz.
Person B: Did you visually see that? I simply must get into her seminar!

Person A: You. Come with me.
Person A: No. Not you. You.
Person A: I shall tutor you privately. And take no other students. Now come.

Person B: Madame Morrible, you are-- no, seriously, I admire you so, soooo--
Person A: Enough.

Person A: I have no faith in you, dear. This was your roommate's idea, not mine.
Person A: I'm a sorceress, not a mind reader! I've no idea why! But I cannot risk losing her. So-- here I am.

Person B: My powers are purely meteorological. I can stop and start rain, make a bit of wind. But you, Dearie, I believe--
Person B: Your powers could be...
